Tamem (Tom) Jalallar

Senior IT Systems Administrator / Technical Lead

I'm a Senior IT Systems Administrator and Technical Lead with 6+ years of enterprise experience supporting executive leadership, improving reliability, and building repeatable systems. I specialize in identity & access management, modern endpoint management, and automation across Windows and macOS. I care about secure-by-default solutions, clean user experiences, and operational consistency. Detailed case studies are available upon request due to confidentiality.
